";s:11:"screenshots";s:1035:"<ol><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-1.jpg?rev=2074177"><img src="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-1.jpg?rev=2074177" alt=""></a></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-2.jpg?rev=2074177"><img src="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-2.jpg?rev=2074177" alt=""></a></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-3.jpg?rev=2074177"><img src="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-3.jpg?rev=2074177" alt=""></a></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-4.jpg?rev=2074177"><img src="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-4.jpg?rev=2074177" alt=""></a></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-5.jpg?rev=2074177"><img src="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-5.jpg?rev=2074177" alt=""></a></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-6.jpg?rev=2074177"><img src="https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/screenshot-6.jpg?rev=2074177" alt=""></a></li></ol>";}s:11:"description";s:16373:"<p>WooCommerce is a flexible, open-source eCommerce solution built on WordPress. Whether you&#8217;re launching a business, taking an existing brick and mortar store online, or designing sites for clients you can get started quickly and build exactly the store you want.</p>
<p>Activate the free WooCommerce plugin on a new or existing WordPress site, follow the optional guided tour, and set up a new store in minutes with:</p>
<ul>
<li>Product, Cart, and Checkout pages</li>
<li>Secure payments by credit card and alternatives</li>
<li>Configurable shipping options, including flat rates and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/shipping/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">label printing</a></li>
<li>Integrate content and commerce across your site via modular blocks</li>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/tax/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Automated tax calculations</a></li>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-google-analytics/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Analytics</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/mailchimp-for-woocommerce/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">MailChimp</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/facebook/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Facebook</a> integration</li>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/posts/woocommerce-admin-a-new-central-dashboard-for-woocommerce/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Central store dashboard</a> with key metrics, and more.</li>
</ul>
<p>Beyond the basics, WooCommerce is fully customizable and extendable:</p>
<ul>
<li>Choose a design to suit your brand and industry.</li>
<li>Enhance your store with free and paid extensions: add features and integrate with local and global eCommerce web services.</li>
<li>Inspect and modify any aspect of the core plugin code.</li>
<li>Leverage hooks and filters to modify functions.</li>
<li>Build on top of the REST API and webhooks.</li>
</ul>
<p>Open-source freedoms mean full ownership of content and data forever – plus the expertise of a friendly <a href="https://woocommerce.com/meetups/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">global community</a>.</p>
<p>WooCommerce is built to allow store managers to run an eCommerce site themselves, no web developer needed. There is also a free WooCommerce <a href="https://woocommerce.com/mobile/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">mobile app</a> (Android and iOS) for store management on the go.</p>
<p>WooCommerce is developed and supported by Automattic, the creators of Jetpack and WordPress.com, along with independent contributors. The <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">official extension marketplace</a> is on WooCommerce.com.</p>
<h4>From subscriptions to gym classes to luxury cars</h4>
<p>With WooCommerce, you can sell both physical and digital goods in all shapes and sizes, offer product variations, complex configurations, and instant downloads to shoppers; and even sell affiliate goods from online marketplaces.</p>
<p>And those are just the out-of-the-box options. With paid extensions, you can extend your WooCommerce store to take bookings, offer memberships, set up recurring payments by subscription, create dynamic pricing rules, and much more.</p>
<p>Start a monthly wine subscription box, offer a discount on yoga mats to members who’ve attended 10+ classes, offer configurable hampers or personalized jewelry – it’s all possible with WooCommerce.</p>
<h4>Comprehensive payment options</h4>
<p>WooCommerce comes bundled with the ability to accept major credit cards, alternative payment methods, BACS (bank transfers), and cash on delivery.</p>
<p>For additional options, WooCommerce also integrates with more than 140 region-specific gateways including popular choices like <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/stripe/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Stripe</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-gateway-paypal-checkout/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">PayPal</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/square/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Square</a> and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/pay-with-amazon/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Amazon Pay</a>. <a href="https://woocommerce.com/apple-pay/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Apple Pay</a> and Google Pay are also supported.</p>
<p>Search for your payment service provider of choice on the <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/payment-gateways/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">official marketplace</a>.</p>
<h4>Ship locally and globally</h4>
<p>Shipping with WooCommerce is highly configurable. Adjust the built-in settings to offer free shipping or flat rate shipping, limit your shipments to specific countries by setting up shipping zones, or open your store up to the world.</p>
<p>Official extensions connect you with hundreds of local and international carriers – including <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/royal-mail/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Royal Mail</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/fedex-shipping-module/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">FedEx</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/australia-post-shipping-method/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Australia Post</a> – and let you integrate with <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/shipping-methods/inventory-fulfillment/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">inventory management and fulfilment providers</a>.</p>
<p>There are also extensions available to add <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/shipping-methods/delivery-shipping-options/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">delivery and shipping options</a> and support strategies like buy-one-get-one free, free gifts, and add-ons. <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/shipping/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Shipping</a> supports real-time calculations and printing labels at home.</p>
<h4>Design your store with themes and blocks</h4>
<p>WooCommerce store design starts with a theme of your choice. There are hundreds of free and paid themes available, including <a href="https://woocommerce.com/storefront/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Storefront</a> by Automattic &#8212; it&#8217;s free to all stores and you can choose to have it installed for you during the guided setup.</p>
<p>Storefront offers deep WooCommerce integration and prioritizes speed and uptime. You can add your brand and define your style by customizing Storefront yourself or adding one of several industry-themed <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/themes/storefront-child-theme-themes/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Storefront child themes</a>.</p>
<p>Personalize your store&#8217;s design even more with WooCommerce Blocks (available in WooCommerce 3.6 and above) &#8212; use them to add selections of or single products to any page, for a seamless blending of commerce into content.</p>
<h4>Customize your store with extensions</h4>
<p>The easiest way to add features and functionality to a WooCommerce store is with an extension:</p>
<ul>
<li>Sell anything &#8211; <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-subscriptions/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Subscriptions</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-memberships/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Memberships</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-bookings/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Bookings</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/product-bundles/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Product Bundles</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/product-type/" rel="nofollow ugc">more</a>. </li>
<li>Make your store, your way &#8211; <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/product-add-ons/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Product Add-Ons</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-checkout-field-editor/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Checkout Field Editor</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-additional-variation-images/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Additional Variation Images</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/customize-product-pages?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">more</a>.</li>
<li>Customize your shipping options &#8211; <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/table-rate-shipping/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Table Rate Shipping</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/shipment-tracking/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Shipment Tracking</a>, live rates from <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/shipping-methods/shipping-carriers/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">top carriers</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/shipping-methods/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">more</a>.</li>
<li>Find your audience, market to them your way &#8211; <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/google-product-feed/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Product Feed</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/livechat/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">LiveChat</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/amazon-ebay-integration/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Amazon/eBay marketplace integration</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/marketing-extensions/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">more</a>.</li>
<li>Drive sales – <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/dynamic-pricing/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Dynamic Pricing</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/smart-coupons/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Smart Coupons</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/google-ads/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Ads</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/marketing-extensions/promotions/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">more</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>There are hundreds of official extensions reviewed by WooCommerce developers available on the WooCommerce.com marketplace, and many in the WordPress.org repository and on the wider web.</p>
<h4>Control your data forever</h4>
<p>WooCommerce gives you complete control – from taxes to stock levels to customer accounts. Add and remove extensions, change your store’s design, and switch themes or hosts or payment service providers, all as you please.</p>
<p>In a world increasingly aware of the importance of data protection, WooCommerce gives you full ownership over what is tracked and stored. If you opt to share <a href="https://woocommerce.com/usage-tracking/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">usage data</a> with us, your data is anonymized and kept secure. At any stage, you can opt out of all forms of tracking while still enjoying all of WooCommerce&#8217;s capabilities.</p>
<p>With WooCommerce, your data belongs to you. One of the risks of using a hosted eCommerce platform the risk of losing your store if the provider closes. WooCommerce store data is future-proof &#8212; you’re are free to export all your content and take your site  wherever you choose.</p>
<h4>Why developers like WooCommerce</h4>
<p>WooCommerce was originally created with developers in mind. Built with a REST API, it integrates with virtually any service. Store data can be accessed anywhere, anytime, 100% securely.</p>
<p>WooCommerce allows developers to easily create, modify, and scale a store that meets client’s specifications, and to make enhancements either with extensions or with customs solution.</p>
<p>No matter the size of the store you want to build, WooCommerce has a robust framework that supports stores from basic to enterprise – with content and commerce in a single, central location.</p>
<p>WooCommerce is audited by a dedicated team of developers who work across time zones to identify and patch any and all discovered bugs. There is comprehensive, easily-accessible documentation that is updated with each release. With our docs, you’ll learn how to create the site your client needs.</p>
<h4>Join our growing community</h4>
<p>WooCommerce is one of the fastest-growing eCommerce communities. We’re proud that the helpfulness of the community and wealth of resources available online are frequently cited as reasons our users love it.</p>
<p>There are 80+ <a href="https://woocommerce.com/woocommerce/meetups/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Meetups</a> taking place in cities across the world that you can attend for free and even get involved in running. WooCommerce also has a regular presence at WordCamps across the globe – and we’d love to meet you.</p>
<p>If you’re interested in contributing to WooCommerce we’ve got more than 350 contributors, and there’s always room for more. Head to the <a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce GitHub Repository</a> to find out how you can pitch in.</p>
<p>WooCommerce is currently 100% translated into 24 languages, including Danish, Ukrainian, and Persian. If you’re interested in helping to localize WooCommerce by adding your local language, visit <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/woocommerce?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>.</p>
<h3>Contributors &amp; Developers</h3>
<p>“WooCommerce” has been translated into 55 locales. Thank you to <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/woocommerce/contributors" rel="nofollow ugc">the translators</a> for their contributions. <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/woocommerce?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">Translate “WooCommerce” into your language</a>.</p>
<p>INTERESTED IN DEVELOPMENT?<br />
<a href="https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">Browse the code</a>, check out the <a href="https://plugins.svn.wordpress.org/woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">SVN repository</a>, or subscribe to the <a href="https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/log/woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">development log</a> by <a href="https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/log/woocommerce/?limit=100&amp;mode=stop_on_copy&amp;format=rss" rel="nofollow ugc">RSS</a>.</p>

Page Builder";s:4:"slug";s:9:"elementor";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.9.7";s:6:"author";s:115:"<a <p>It&#8217;s about time for a live page builder, with no limits of design. A page builder that delivers high-end page designs and advanced capabilities, never before seen on WordPress.</p>
<p>It&#8217;s time for <strong><a href="https://elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Page Builder</a></strong>.</p>
<h4>Faster. Much faster.</h4>
<p>Instant reaction was a key feature we wanted to achieve. And we did. Instant drag &amp; drop page builder, instant live edit, instant page load. The speed of Elementor is not matched by any other page builder, free or paid. This makes the interface fun and easy to work with, as well as reduces the time it takes to design.</p>
<h4>Live design. Truly live.</h4>
<p>Never again work on the backend and guess what the frontend will look like. With Elementor page builder, you edit the page and simultaneously see exactly how it looks like. Elementor features live design &amp; inline editing, so the whole process of writing and designing is done directly on the page, with no need to press update or go to preview mode. It also works perfectly with or without Gutenberg.</p>
<h4>Surprises you won’t see anywhere else.</h4>
<p>With Elementor&#8217;s unique features, you can create websites that have that certain &#8216;designer touch&#8217;. Among our page builder features are: Box Shadows, Background Overlays, Hover Effects, Headline Effects, Animations, Shape Dividers, Gradient Backgrounds and much more.</p>
<h4>Pre-Designed Templates &amp; Blocks</h4>
<p>Choose from 100+ of beautiful full page <a href="https://library.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">WordPress templates</a> and customize them to make them your own. You can also build your page by choosing from 300+ Blocks.</p>
<p>Blocks are pre-designed section templates that can be easily combined into any page. Blocks include a variety of categories: services, testimonials, call to action and more. Save and reuse Elementor templates on different pages, or export them to a different website with a click.</p>
<h4>Mobile First. Mobile Editing.</h4>
<p>Elementor Page Builder comes with an exclusive toolset, that lets you create truly a responsive website in a whole new and visual way. From different font size, padding and margin per device, to reverse column ordering, this is the most powerful mobile page builder for creating perfect responsive websites.</p>
<h4>Undo / Redo &amp; Revision History.</h4>
<p>Our page builder includes undo and redo for any action you make. Click on Ctrl / Cmd + Z, or browse through the complete list of actions. Want to go back ever further? Switch to Revisions to view a complete list of all earlier saved versions of the page.</p>
<h4>Canvas. A Blank Page Template for Landing Pages.</h4>
<p>Design your entire page in the page builder. No header, no footer, just Elementor. This is perfect for landing pages and coming soon pages. Canvas works on any theme, and lets you get rid of the header area so you get a blank template to work on.</p>
<h4>Built-in Maintenance Mode &amp; Under Construction.</h4>
<p>Need to get your site offline for maintenance? Use Elementor page builder&#8217;s built in Maintenance Mode &amp; Coming Soon feature to show your visitors an under construction / coming soon page.</p>
<h4>Try Elementor Pro. The Best page Builder for WordPress.</h4>
<p><a href="https://elementor.com/pro/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Pro</a> vastly improves your design workflow and lets you design faster and better than ever. With Elementor Pro, everything is done visually and without code.</p>
<p>Making changes to your theme shouldn&#8217;t be so hard. Endless coding, dealing with developers, switching themes. The <a href="https://elementor.com/theme-builder/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Theme Builder</a> in Elementor Pro turns the entire process of creating WordPress websites 100% visual including your site&#8217;s header, footer, single post and archive page design.</p>
<p>There are many other <a href="https://elementor.com/features/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">features</a> to help you build better websites:</p>
<ul>
<li>Visual and intuitive form builder</li>
<li>Marketing automation and CRM integrations</li>
<li>Custom fonts</li>
<li>Role manager</li>
<li>Blog post layout widget</li>
<li>Image &amp; video sliders</li>
<li>WooCommerce</li>
<li>Global widgets</li>
<li>Custom CSS</li>
<li>Animated headlines</li>
<li>And much more.</li>
</ul>
<p>Join the elite web professionals who enjoy <a href="https://elementor.com/pro/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Pro</a>!</p>
<h4>30 free widgets and counting</h4>
<p>We packed 30 of the most useful widgets into our page builder. True, that&#8217;s way more than we had to offer, but we wanted to spare no widget from you, so you can reach the top of your design capabilities.</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Heading</strong>. Add eye-catching headlines.</li>
<li><strong>Image</strong>. Control the size, opacity and other settings of images.</li>
<li><strong>Text Editor</strong>. A WYSIWYG text editor, just like the WordPress editor.</li>
<li><strong>Video</strong>. Add YouTube \ Vimeo to your page.</li>
<li><strong>Button</strong>. Controlling every aspect of the button design.</li>
<li><strong>Image Box</strong>. A box that includes image, headline and text.</li>
<li><strong>Testimonials</strong>. Customer testimonials that show social proof.</li>
<li><strong>Icon</strong>. Place one or more of 600+ icons available.</li>
<li><strong>Icon Box</strong>. Works the same as the image box, only with icons.</li>
<li><strong>Social Icons</strong>. Icons to your social pages like Facebook / Twitter.</li>
<li><strong>Image Gallery</strong>. Displays your images in an aligned grid.</li>
<li><strong>Image Carousel</strong>. A rotating carousel or slider of chosen images.</li>
<li><strong>Icon List</strong>. A bullet list with any chosen icon and text.</li>
<li><strong>Counter</strong>. Show stats and numbers in an escalating manner.</li>
<li><strong>Progress Bar</strong>. Include an escalating progress bar.</li>
<li><strong>Tabs</strong>. Vertical or horizontal tabs that display different pieces of content.</li>
<li><strong>Accordion</strong>. A collapsable display of content.</li>
<li><strong>Toggle</strong>. Like Accordion, for FAQ pages.</li>
<li><strong>Star Rating</strong>. Add some social proof with a styled star rating.</li>
<li><strong>Alert</strong>. A colored alert box to draw the attention of the visitor.</li>
<li><strong>HTML</strong>. Insert code into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Shortcode</strong>. Easily insert shortcodes from any plugin into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Menu Anchor</strong>. Link any menu to this anchor.</li>
<li><strong>Read More</strong>. Set the <code>Read More</code> cut-off for the excerpt in archive pages.</li>
<li><strong>Sidebar</strong>. Add any sidebar into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Google Maps</strong>. Embed maps into the page.</li>
<li><strong>SoundCloud</strong>. Add audio bits from SoundCloud.</li>
<li><strong>Divider</strong>. A line that divides different elements in the page.</li>
<li><strong>Spacer</strong>. A space that divides the various elements.</li>
<li><strong>Columns</strong>. Create inner columns within the column.</li>
<li><strong>And counting&#8230;</strong></li>
</ul>
<h4>Multilingual &amp; RTL supported.</h4>
<p>We&#8217;ve integrated RTL and multi language support within the framework of our page builder, so you get a translated panel out of the box, as well as RTL typography support, and developer options to add even more languages.</p>
<h4>Developer API.</h4>
<p>Elementor page builder is free and open source. It&#8217;s the perfect page builder plugin to be extended and integrated further. It was created and developed with the developer in mind, and we have already seen some truly remarkable addons already developed.<br />
To help you get started and learn just how to integrate with Elementor, we have created the <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Official Elementor Developer Resources</a> and the <a href="https://code.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Code Reference</a>.</p>

<h4>Be a contributor</h4>
<p>If you want to contribute, go to our <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor GitHub Repository</a> and see where you can help.</p>
<p>You can also add a new language via <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>. We&#8217;ve built a short guide explaining <a href="https://go.elementor.com/translate/" rel="nofollow ugc">how to translate and localize the plugin</a>.</p>
<h4>Documentation and Support</h4>
<ul>
<li>For documentation and tutorials go to our <a href="https://docs.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation</a>.</li>
<li>If you have any more questions, visit our support on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/elementor">Plugin&#8217;s Forum</a>.</li>
<li>For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at <a href="https://elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Page Builder</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Liked Elementor?</h4>
<ul>
<li>Join our <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/Elementors/" rel="nofollow ugc">Facebook Group</a>.</li>
<li>Learn from our tutorials on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/c/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">Youtube Channel</a>.</li>
<li>Or rate us on <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/elementor/reviews/?filter=5/#new-post">WordPress</a> 🙂</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:1493:"<h4>Minimum Requirements</h4>
<ul>
<li>WordPress 5.0 or greater</li>
<li>PHP version 5.6 or greater</li>
<li>MySQL version 5.0 or greater</li>
</ul>
<h4>We recommend your host supports:</h4>
<ul>
<li>PHP version 7.0 or greater</li>
<li>MySQL version 5.6 or greater</li>
<li>WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)</li>
</ul>
<p><span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class='youtube-player' type='text/html' width='640' height='360' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ypn6fltn_7s?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;fs=1&#038;autohide=2&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;wmode=transparent' allowfullscreen='true' style='border:0;'></iframe></span></p>
<h4>Installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the <code>wp-content/plugins/</code> directory of your WordPress installation.</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress.</li>
<li>Go to Pages &gt; Add New</li>
<li>Press the &#8216;Edit with Elementor&#8217; button.</li>
<li>Now you can drag and drop widgets from the left panel onto the content area, as well as add new sections and columns that make up the page structure.</li>
</ol>
<p>For documentation and tutorials visit our <a href="https://docs.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Knowledge Base</a>.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:1399:"
<h4>With Elementor, do I still need a theme?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Think of it like this: a theme is like the frame of the picture, and Elementor is the tool to paint the picture inside the frame.</p>
</p>
<h4>Is Elementor compatible with Posts and Custom Post Types?</h4>
<p>
<p>It sure is! You can set which post types will enable Elementor in the settings page.</p>
</p>
<h4>Can I use other plugin widgets inside Elementor?</h4>
<p>
<p>Sure can! Plugin widgets that appear in the WordPress widgets menu will also appear inside Elementor automatically. Just drag and drop them onto the page.</p>
</p>
<h4>Do I need to know how to code to use Elementor?</h4>
<p>
<p>Absolutely not! Elementor is a live frontend page builder, that lets you reach a high end design with no need to write even a line of code or CSS.</p>
</p>
<h4>Will Elementor work with RTL or other languages?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yeah! Elementor enables to seamlessly build RTL pages as well as other translated pages in any language. You can read more about <a href="https://go.elementor.com/translate/" rel="nofollow ugc">translation and localization</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>My site is working with WordPress 2.6, will Elementor work for me?</h4>
<p>
<p>No. Elementor supports WordPress 5.0 or greater, and is compatible with PHP 5.6 or greater. We recommend your host supports PHP version 7.0 or greater and MySQL version 5.6 or greater.</p>
</p>

<li>Tweak: Changed all occurrences of <code>text-overflow: ellipsis</code> to a single <code>mixin</code></li>
<li>Tweak: Added &#8220;Pause On Interaction&#8221; option to Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>e-icons</code> library to v5.5.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated <code>e-gallery</code> library to v1.1.0</li>
<li>Tweak: Dropped Support for WP v4.9, now supporting WP v5.0+</li>
<li>Tweak: Dropped delete revision option in Revisions Panel since WordPress v5.3 (<a href="https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/43709" rel="nofollow ugc">Topic</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added compatibility with WordPress v5.3</li>
<li>Fix: Use CSS Flex to align and order button icon (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/561" rel="nofollow ugc">#561</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Remove Ninja Forms compatibility script which causes server issues (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8267" rel="nofollow ugc">#8267</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added <code>title</code> attribute to embedded iframes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9374" rel="nofollow ugc">#9374</a>, Props <a href="https://github.com/shipley-dcc" rel="nofollow ugc">@shipley-dcc</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Reset style in a button doesn&#8217;t work on colors (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/8454" rel="nofollow ugc">#8454</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: No fallback when SVG file doesn&#8217;t exist (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9481" rel="nofollow ugc">#9481</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Custom shapes &#8220;negative&#8221; support fix (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9761" rel="nofollow ugc">#9761</a>)</li>
<li>Fix : Shapes SVG include PHP Parse Error If the uploaded SVG file contain <code>&lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?&gt;</code> (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/9693" rel="nofollow ugc">#9693</a>, Props <a href="https://github.com/MarieComet" rel="nofollow ugc">@MarieComet</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added better output escaping in the attributes for checkbox lists in Admin forms (Props <a href="https://github.com/MarieComet" rel="nofollow ugc">@MarieComet</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Adding a link overrides the Title and Description colors in Testimonial widget</li>
<li>Fix: Removed redundant Editor Panel Spacer in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: &#8220;Delete All Content&#8221; doesn&#8217;t close current widget editing options</li>
<li>Fix: Pause on hover option doesn&#8217;t work in Image Carousel widget</li>
<li>Fix: Limit transition duration in Ken Burns CSS only to <code>transform</code> property</li>
<li>Fix: Recommended tab icons don&#8217;t change when there&#8217;s more than one <code>Icons</code> control per widget</li>
<li>Fix: Hidden sticky section generates redundant scroll offset when using Anchors</li>
<li>Fix: Inserting a saved section as a template uses the same <code>ID</code></li>
<li>Fix: Double rendering of elements in Editor</li>
<li>Deprecated: See all deprecations to this version in our <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/v2-8-0-planned-deprecations/" rel="nofollow ugc">Developers Deprecations Post</a></li>
</ul>

<li>Tweak: Updated YouTube related videos control due to YouTube&#8217;s API changes (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5984" rel="nofollow ugc">#5984</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5939" rel="nofollow ugc">#5939</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added a general <code>hook elementor/frontend/after_render</code> to element-base</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>elementor/element/before_attribute_render</code> hook before attributes are rendered</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>elementor/element/after_attribute_render</code> hook after attributes are rendered</li>
<li>Tweak: New <code>elementor/editor/init</code> action</li>
<li>Tweak: A new <code>get_post_type_title</code> method for document</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>Ctrl/Cmd + E</code> shortcut to open Finder modal</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>Ctrl/Cmd + ?</code> shortcut to open all keyboard shortcuts modal</li>
<li>Tweak: Added <code>Esc</code> shortcut for opening the settings menu</li>
<li>Tweak: Update Eicons v3.9.2</li>
<li>Fix: Added default width for SVG image to support edge cases (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5987" rel="nofollow ugc">#5987</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Better WP Widget hooks support (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5844" rel="nofollow ugc">#5844</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Exclude image link from lightbox when the link has <code>download</code> attribute (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5996" rel="nofollow ugc">#5996</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Background Gradient not working inside Repeater control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5914" rel="nofollow ugc">#5914</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added support for future post status (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/5681" rel="nofollow ugc">#5681</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/6000" rel="nofollow ugc">#6000</a>)</li>

<li>Fix: Allow plugins to set current page as Login Page for Maintenance Mode</li>
<li>Fix: Added navigation between tabs via tab keyboard for better accessibility</li>
<li>Fix: Use Thumbnail if selected size is missing</li>
<li>Fix: A new method to handle with multiple image custom sizes</li>
<li>Fix: Import template by WP CLI</li>
<li>Fix: Height of bar without content in Progress Bar widget</li>
<li>Fix: Added compatibility with a new embed API of YouTube</li>
<li>Fix: Don&#8217;t render wrapper of element if the content is empty</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Source_Local::TYPE_META_KEY</code> is no longer supported</li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>Document::save_type()</code> is replaced by <code>Document::save_template_type()</code></li>
</ul>

<ul>

<li>Fix: Waypoint in order to support default options and trigger once</li>
<li>Fix: Entrance animation near the bottom of the page (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2114" rel="nofollow ugc">#2114</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/2060" rel="nofollow ugc">#2060</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Avoid delete current revision preview, check it&#8217;s a valid revision</li>
<li>Fix: Change post-status in page settings</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.5.0 &#8211; 2017-06-28</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: A big UI makeover to the editor for the 1st birthday of Elementor (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/493" rel="nofollow ugc">#493</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/335" rel="nofollow ugc">#335</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/692" rel="nofollow ugc">#692</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added responsive mode for Column Width control, including Tablet! (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/418" rel="nofollow ugc">#418</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added option to set the column width trough the panel (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/847" rel="nofollow ugc">#847</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Element Hover for Background, BG Overlay, Border &amp; Box Shadow</li>
<li>New: Added <code>nofollow</code> option for all link controls (<a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/elementor-nofollow-links-is-there-a-way-to-specify-links-nofollow-attribute/">Topic</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/953" rel="nofollow ugc">#953</a>, <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1695" rel="nofollow ugc">#1695</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added HTML Tag for Section &amp; Column (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1619" rel="nofollow ugc">#1619</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Inset option for Box shadow control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1623" rel="nofollow ugc">#1623</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added option to rollback to a previous version of Elementor &amp; Pro</li>
<li>New: Added option to get update notifications for beta versions of Elementor &amp; Pro</li>
<li>New: Added Space Between Widgets option under global settings and per column (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1221" rel="nofollow ugc">#1221</a>)</li>
<li>New: Added Z-Index option for all elements and removed original default <code>z-index</code> from <code>widgets-wrap</code> (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1743" rel="nofollow ugc">#1743</a>)</li>
<li>New: Import template get the page settings also if available</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Tabs UI for admin setting pages</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Layout tab for column for better workflow</li>
<li>Tweak: Elementor not active when WP version doesn&#8217;t meet minimum requirements</li>
<li>Tweak: Added Animation Delay to Entrance Animation for all elements (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/558" rel="nofollow ugc">#558</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved panel accessibility by adding <code>for</code> to the labels</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for min-height in Section (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/630" rel="nofollow ugc">#630</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for image size in Image / Image Box widgets</li>
<li>Tweak: Added PX unit &amp; responsive control for border width in Divider widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for gap in Divider widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for spacing in Image Box widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for slides to show control in Image Carousel</li>
<li>Tweak: Added responsive control for border radius in Image widget</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed video embed method for better performance and fix loading bug</li>
<li>Tweak: Changed <code>the_content</code> priority for better integration with 3rd party plugins (e.g WooCommerce Membership)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added WP filter to get available image sizes</li>
<li>Tweak: Updated Swiper library to 3.4.2</li>
<li>Tweak: Limit up to 100 revisions to display in the panel for better performance</li>
<li>Fix: YouTube link detection regex for some situations</li>
<li>Fix: Content flashes before entrance animation (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1672" rel="nofollow ugc">#1672</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Added <code>latin-ext</code> subset in Font control for Czech language (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1630" rel="nofollow ugc">#1630</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Restore to post version without Elementor in Revision History</li>
<li>Fix: Removed <code>margin: 0</code> setting from figure inside text editor widget</li>
<li>Fix: Content flashes before entrance animation (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1672" rel="nofollow ugc">#1672</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Bug Image Carousel widget in RTL direction</li>
<li>Fix: <code>show_label</code> affected inner label in the repeater control (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/1707" rel="nofollow ugc">#1707</a>)</li>

<li>Deprecated: <code>elementor/elements/print_template</code> is replaced by <code>elementor/element/print_template</code></li>
<li>Deprecated: <code>elementor/element_css/parse_css</code> is replaced by <code>elementor/element/parse_css</code></li>
</ul>

<li>Tweak: Optimization for memory usage (30% less!)</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved UI for preview editor</li>
<li>Tweak: Add <code>contain</code> background image CSS option (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/pull/297" rel="nofollow ugc">#297</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Added compatibility for NextGen Gallery plugin (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/296" rel="nofollow ugc">#296</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak: Print JS scripts in the footer</li>
<li>Tweak: Set color picker control <code>alpha</code> for all widgets</li>
<li>Fix: Remove <code>maxlength</code> attribute from color picker input (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/298" rel="nofollow ugc">#298</a>)</li>
<li>Fix: Background video: Set object-fit only HTML5 player (solved Safari YouTube issue)</li>
<li>Fix: Bug with target blank link in Icon List widget</li>
<li>Fix: Bug with alignment in Icon List widget (<a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor/issues/283" rel="nofollow ugc">#283</a>)</li>

display: block;"><iframe class='youtube-player' type='text/html' width='640' height='360' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/kB4U67tiQLA?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;fs=1&#038;autohide=2&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;wmode=transparent' allowfullscreen='true' style='border:0;'></iframe></span></p>
<p>It&#8217;s about time for a live page builder, with no limits of design. A page builder that delivers high-end page designs and advanced capabilities, never before seen on WordPress.</p>
<p>It&#8217;s time for <strong><a href="https://elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Page Builder</a></strong>.</p>
<h4>Faster. Much faster.</h4>
<p>Instant reaction was a key feature we wanted to achieve. And we did. Instant drag &amp; drop page builder, instant live edit, instant page load. The speed of Elementor is not matched by any other page builder, free or paid. This makes the interface fun and easy to work with, as well as reduces the time it takes to design.</p>
<h4>Live design. Truly live.</h4>
<p>Never again work on the backend and guess what the frontend will look like. With Elementor page builder, you edit the page and simultaneously see exactly how it looks like. Elementor features live design &amp; inline editing, so the whole process of writing and designing is done directly on the page, with no need to press update or go to preview mode. It also works perfectly with or without Gutenberg.</p>
<h4>Surprises you won’t see anywhere else.</h4>
<p>With Elementor&#8217;s unique features, you can create websites that have that certain &#8216;designer touch&#8217;. Among our page builder features are: Box Shadows, Background Overlays, Hover Effects, Headline Effects, Animations, Shape Dividers, Gradient Backgrounds and much more.</p>
<h4>Pre-Designed Templates &amp; Blocks</h4>
<p>Choose from 100+ of beautiful full page <a href="https://library.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">WordPress templates</a> and customize them to make them your own. You can also build your page by choosing from 300+ Blocks.</p>
<p>Blocks are pre-designed section templates that can be easily combined into any page. Blocks include a variety of categories: services, testimonials, call to action and more. Save and reuse Elementor templates on different pages, or export them to a different website with a click.</p>
<h4>Mobile First. Mobile Editing.</h4>
<p>Elementor Page Builder comes with an exclusive toolset, that lets you create truly a responsive website in a whole new and visual way. From different font size, padding and margin per device, to reverse column ordering, this is the most powerful mobile page builder for creating perfect responsive websites.</p>
<h4>Undo / Redo &amp; Revision History.</h4>
<p>Our page builder includes undo and redo for any action you make. Click on Ctrl / Cmd + Z, or browse through the complete list of actions. Want to go back ever further? Switch to Revisions to view a complete list of all earlier saved versions of the page.</p>
<h4>Canvas. A Blank Page Template for Landing Pages.</h4>
<p>Design your entire page in the page builder. No header, no footer, just Elementor. This is perfect for landing pages and coming soon pages. Canvas works on any theme, and lets you get rid of the header area so you get a blank template to work on.</p>
<h4>Built-in Maintenance Mode &amp; Under Construction.</h4>
<p>Need to get your site offline for maintenance? Use Elementor page builder&#8217;s built in Maintenance Mode &amp; Coming Soon feature to show your visitors an under construction / coming soon page.</p>
<h4>Try Elementor Pro. The Best page Builder for WordPress.</h4>
<p><a href="https://elementor.com/pro/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Pro</a> vastly improves your design workflow and lets you design faster and better than ever. With Elementor Pro, everything is done visually and without code.</p>
<p>Making changes to your theme shouldn&#8217;t be so hard. Endless coding, dealing with developers, switching themes. The <a href="https://elementor.com/theme-builder/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Theme Builder</a> in Elementor Pro turns the entire process of creating WordPress websites 100% visual including your site&#8217;s header, footer, single post and archive page design.</p>
<p>There are many other <a href="https://elementor.com/features/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">features</a> to help you build better websites:</p>
<ul>
<li>Visual and intuitive form builder</li>
<li>Marketing automation and CRM integrations</li>
<li>Custom fonts</li>
<li>Role manager</li>
<li>Blog post layout widget</li>
<li>Image &amp; video sliders</li>
<li>WooCommerce</li>
<li>Global widgets</li>
<li>Custom CSS</li>
<li>Animated headlines</li>
<li>And much more.</li>
</ul>
<p>Join the elite web professionals who enjoy <a href="https://elementor.com/pro/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Pro</a>!</p>
<h4>30 free widgets and counting</h4>
<p>We packed 30 of the most useful widgets into our page builder. True, that&#8217;s way more than we had to offer, but we wanted to spare no widget from you, so you can reach the top of your design capabilities.</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Heading</strong>. Add eye-catching headlines.</li>
<li><strong>Image</strong>. Control the size, opacity and other settings of images.</li>
<li><strong>Text Editor</strong>. A WYSIWYG text editor, just like the WordPress editor.</li>
<li><strong>Video</strong>. Add YouTube \ Vimeo to your page.</li>
<li><strong>Button</strong>. Controlling every aspect of the button design.</li>
<li><strong>Image Box</strong>. A box that includes image, headline and text.</li>
<li><strong>Testimonials</strong>. Customer testimonials that show social proof.</li>
<li><strong>Icon</strong>. Place one or more of 600+ icons available.</li>
<li><strong>Icon Box</strong>. Works the same as the image box, only with icons.</li>
<li><strong>Social Icons</strong>. Icons to your social pages like Facebook / Twitter.</li>
<li><strong>Image Gallery</strong>. Displays your images in an aligned grid.</li>
<li><strong>Image Carousel</strong>. A rotating carousel or slider of chosen images.</li>
<li><strong>Icon List</strong>. A bullet list with any chosen icon and text.</li>
<li><strong>Counter</strong>. Show stats and numbers in an escalating manner.</li>
<li><strong>Progress Bar</strong>. Include an escalating progress bar.</li>
<li><strong>Tabs</strong>. Vertical or horizontal tabs that display different pieces of content.</li>
<li><strong>Accordion</strong>. A collapsable display of content.</li>
<li><strong>Toggle</strong>. Like Accordion, for FAQ pages.</li>
<li><strong>Star Rating</strong>. Add some social proof with a styled star rating.</li>
<li><strong>Alert</strong>. A colored alert box to draw the attention of the visitor.</li>
<li><strong>HTML</strong>. Insert code into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Shortcode</strong>. Easily insert shortcodes from any plugin into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Menu Anchor</strong>. Link any menu to this anchor.</li>
<li><strong>Read More</strong>. Set the <code>Read More</code> cut-off for the excerpt in archive pages.</li>
<li><strong>Sidebar</strong>. Add any sidebar into the page.</li>
<li><strong>Google Maps</strong>. Embed maps into the page.</li>
<li><strong>SoundCloud</strong>. Add audio bits from SoundCloud.</li>
<li><strong>Divider</strong>. A line that divides different elements in the page.</li>
<li><strong>Spacer</strong>. A space that divides the various elements.</li>
<li><strong>Columns</strong>. Create inner columns within the column.</li>
<li><strong>And counting&#8230;</strong></li>
</ul>
<h4>Multilingual &amp; RTL supported.</h4>
<p>We&#8217;ve integrated RTL and multi language support within the framework of our page builder, so you get a translated panel out of the box, as well as RTL typography support, and developer options to add even more languages.</p>
<h4>Developer API.</h4>
<p>Elementor page builder is free and open source. It&#8217;s the perfect page builder plugin to be extended and integrated further. It was created and developed with the developer in mind, and we have already seen some truly remarkable addons already developed.<br />
To help you get started and learn just how to integrate with Elementor, we have created the <a href="https://developers.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Official Elementor Developer Resources</a> and the <a href="https://code.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Code Reference</a>.</p>

</ul>
<h4>Be a contributor</h4>
<p>If you want to contribute, go to our <a href="https://github.com/elementor/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor GitHub Repository</a> and see where you can help.</p>
<p>You can also add a new language via <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>. We&#8217;ve built a short guide explaining <a href="https://go.elementor.com/translate/" rel="nofollow ugc">how to translate and localize the plugin</a>.</p>
<h4>Documentation and Support</h4>
<ul>
<li>For documentation and tutorials go to our <a href="https://docs.elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation</a>.</li>
<li>If you have any more questions, visit our support on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/elementor">Plugin&#8217;s Forum</a>.</li>
<li>For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at <a href="https://elementor.com/?utm_source=wp-repo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=readme" rel="nofollow ugc">Elementor Page Builder</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Liked Elementor?</h4>
<ul>
<li>Join our <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/Elementors/" rel="nofollow ugc">Facebook Group</a>.</li>
<li>Learn from our tutorials on <a href="https://www.youtube.com/c/elementor" rel="nofollow ugc">Youtube Channel</a>.</li>
<li>Or rate us on <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/elementor/reviews/?filter=5/#new-post">WordPress</a> 🙂</li>
</ul>

s:11:"donate_link";s:0:"";s:18:"author_block_count";i:0;s:19:"author_block_rating";d:98;}i:7;O:8:"stdClass":28:{s:4:"name";s:18:"WordPress Importer";s:4:"slug";s:18:"wordpress-importer";s:7:"version";s:3:"0.7";s:6:"author";s:52:"<a href="https://wordpress.org/">wordpressdotorg</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:44:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/briancolinger";s:8:"requires";s:3:"3.7";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.3.2";s:12:"requires_php";b:0;s:13:"compatibility";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";d:62;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:115;i:4;i:22;i:3;i:19;i:2;i:28;i:1;i:104;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:288;s:15:"support_threads";i:5;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:1;s:10:"downloaded";i:30617567;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2020-02-28 9:05am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2010-05-20";s:8:"homepage";s:49:"https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-importer/";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:1308:"<p>The WordPress Importer will import the following content from a WordPress export file:</p>
<ul>
<li>Posts, pages and other custom post types</li>
<li>Comments and comment meta</li>
<li>Custom fields and post meta</li>
<li>Categories, tags and terms from custom taxonomies and term meta</li>
<li>Authors</li>
</ul>
<p>For further information and instructions please see the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/article/importing-content/#wordpress">documention on Importing Content</a>.</p>
<h3>Filters</h3>
<p>The importer has a couple of filters to allow you to completely enable/block certain features:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>import_allow_create_users</code>: return false if you only want to allow mapping to existing users</li>
<li><code>import_allow_fetch_attachments</code>: return false if you do not wish to allow importing and downloading of attachments</li>
<li><code>import_attachment_size_limit</code>: return an integer value for the maximum file size in bytes to save (default is 0, which is unlimited)</li>
</ul>
<p>There are also a few actions available to hook into:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>import_start</code>: occurs after the export file has been uploaded and author import settings have been chosen</li>
<li><code>import_end</code>: called after the last output from the importer</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:654:"<p>The quickest method for installing the importer is:</p>
<ol>
<li>Visit Tools -&gt; Import in the WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Click on the WordPress link in the list of importers</li>
<li>Click &#8220;Install Now&#8221;</li>
<li>Finally click &#8220;Activate Plugin &amp; Run Importer&#8221;</li>
</ol>
<p>If you would prefer to do things manually then follow these instructions:</p>
<ol>
<li>Upload the <code>wordpress-importer</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress</li>
<li>Go to the Tools -&gt; Import screen, click on WordPress</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:1090:"
<h4>Help! I&#8217;m getting out of memory errors or a blank screen.</h4>
<p>
<p>If your exported file is very large, the import script may run into your host&#8217;s configured memory limit for PHP.</p>
<p>A message like &#8220;Fatal error: Allowed memory size of 8388608 bytes exhausted&#8221; indicates that the script can&#8217;t successfully import your XML file under the current PHP memory limit. If you have access to the php.ini file, you can manually increase the limit; if you do not (your WordPress installation is hosted on a shared server, for instance), you might have to break your exported XML file into several smaller pieces and run the import script one at a time.</p>
<p>For those with shared hosting, the best alternative may be to consult hosting support to determine the safest approach for running the import. A host may be willing to temporarily lift the memory limit and/or run the process directly from their end.</p>
<p>&#8212; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/article/importing-content/#before-importing">Support Article: Importing Content</a></p>
</p>

";}s:11:"description";s:1308:"<p>The WordPress Importer will import the following content from a WordPress export file:</p>
<ul>
<li>Posts, pages and other custom post types</li>
<li>Comments and comment meta</li>
<li>Custom fields and post meta</li>
<li>Categories, tags and terms from custom taxonomies and term meta</li>
<li>Authors</li>
</ul>
<p>For further information and instructions please see the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/article/importing-content/#wordpress">documention on Importing Content</a>.</p>
<h3>Filters</h3>
<p>The importer has a couple of filters to allow you to completely enable/block certain features:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>import_allow_create_users</code>: return false if you only want to allow mapping to existing users</li>
<li><code>import_allow_fetch_attachments</code>: return false if you do not wish to allow importing and downloading of attachments</li>
<li><code>import_attachment_size_limit</code>: return an integer value for the maximum file size in bytes to save (default is 0, which is unlimited)</li>
</ul>
<p>There are also a few actions available to hook into:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>import_start</code>: occurs after the export file has been uploaded and author import settings have been chosen</li>
<li><code>import_end</code>: called after the last output from the importer</li>
</ul>
";s:17:"short_description";s:101:"Import posts, pages, comments, custom fields, categories, tags and more from a WordPress export file.";s:13:"download_link";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.7.zip";s:11:"screenshots";a:0:{}s:4:"tags";a:1:{s:8:"importer";s:8:"importer";}s:8:"versions";a:12:{s:3:"0.2";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.2.zip";s:3:"0.3";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.3.zip";s:3:"0.4";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.4.zip";s:3:"0.5";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.5.zip";s:5:"0.5.2";s:67:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.5.2.zip";s:3:"0.6";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.6.zip";s:5:"0.6.1";s:67:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.6.1.zip";s:5:"0.6.2";s:67:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.6.2.zip";s:5:"0.6.3";s:67:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.6.3.zip";s:5:"0.6.4";s:67:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.6.4.zip";s:3:"0.7";s:65:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.0.7.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:61:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wordpress-importer.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:39:"https://wordpressfoundation.org/donate/";s:18:"author_block_count";i:0;s:19:"author_block_rating";d:62;}i:8;O:8:"stdClass":28:{s:4:"name";s:17:"Really Simple SSL";s:4:"slug";s:17:"really-simple-ssl";s:7:"version";s:3:"3.3";s:6:"author";s:78:"<a href="https://really-simple-plugins.com">Rogier Lankhorst, Mark Wolters</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:46:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/rogierlankhorst";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.6";s:6:"tested";s:3:"5.4";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.4";s:13:"compatibility";a:0:{}s:6:"rating";d:100;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:3923;i:4;i:39;i:3;i:7;i:2;i:4;i:1;i:26;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:3999;s:15:"support_threads";i:33;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:32;s:10:"downloaded";i:26109177;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2020-03-19 8:46am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2015-03-15";s:8:"homepage";s:33:"https://www.really-simple-ssl.com";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:3355:"<p>Really Simple SSL automatically detects your settings and configures your website to run over https.<br />
To keep it lightweight, the options are kept to a minimum. The entire site will move to SSL.</p>
<h4>Three simple steps for setup:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Get an SSL certificate (can&#8217;t do that for you, sorry.) <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/how-to-install-a-free-ssl-certificate-on-your-wordpress-cpanel-hosting/" rel="nofollow ugc">See our recommendations for a free SSL certificate</a>.</li>
<li>Activate this plugin</li>
<li>Enable SSL with one click</li>
</ul>
<p>Always backup before you go! If you do not have a sound backup policy, start having one! See <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/backing-up-your-site/" rel="nofollow ugc">our recommendations</a>.</p>
<p>Any code suggestions? We&#8217;re on <a href="https://github.com/rlankhorst/really-simple-ssl" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub</a> as well!</p>
<h4>Love Really Simple SSL?</h4>
<p>Hopefully this plugin saves you some hours of work. If you want to support the continuing development of this plugin, you might consider buying the <a href="https://www.really-simple-ssl.com/pro/" rel="nofollow ugc">premium</a>, which includes<br />
some cool features.</p>
<h4>Pro features</h4>
<ul>
<li>The mixed content scan, which shows you what you have to do if you don&#8217;t have the secure lock yet</li>
<li>The option to enable HTTP Strict Transport Security</li>
<li>The option to configure your site for the HSTS preload list</li>
<li>Advanced security headers for additional security</li>
<li>Mixed Content Fixer for the back-end</li>
<li>More detailed feedback on the configuration page</li>
<li>Certificate expiration check: get an email when your SSL certificate is about to expire</li>
<li>Premium support</li>
</ul>
<h4>What does the plugin actually do</h4>
<ul>
<li>The plugin handles most issues that WordPress has with SSL, like when you&#8217;re behind a reverse proxy/loadbalancer, or when no headers are passed which WordPress can use to detect SSL.</li>
<li>All incoming requests are redirected to https. Default with an internal WordPress redirect, but you can also enable a .htaccess redirect.</li>
<li>The siteurl and homeurl are changed to https.</li>
<li>Your insecure content is fixed by replacing all http:// URL&#8217;s with https://, except hyperlinks to other domains. Dynamically, so no database changes are made (except for the siteurl and homeurl).</li>
</ul>
<p>Check out other plugins developed by Really Simple Plugins as well: <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/complianz-gdpr/">Complianz</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/zip-recipes/">Zip Recipes</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-search-insights/">WP Search Insights</a>.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.really-simple-ssl.com/contact/" rel="nofollow ugc">contact</a> me if you have any questions, issues, or suggestions. Really Simple SSL is developed by <a href="https://www.really-simple-plugins.com" rel="nofollow ugc">Really Simple Plugins</a>.</p>
<h4>Like to have this plugin in your language?</h4>
<p>Translations can be added very easily <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/really-simple-ssl" rel="nofollow ugc">here</a>. If you do, I can get you added as translation editor to approve the translations.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:360:"<p>To install this plugin:</p>
<ol>
<li>Make a backup!</li>
<li>Install your SSL certificate</li>
<li>Download the plugin</li>
<li>Upload the plugin to the wp-content/plugins directory,</li>
<li>Go to “plugins” in your WordPress admin, then click activate.</li>
<li>You will now see a notice asking you to enable SSL. Click it and log in again.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:1951:"
<h4>Knowledge base</h4>
<p>
<p>For more detailed explanations and documentation on redirect loops, deactivating, mixed content, errors, and so on, please search the <a href="https://www.really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/" rel="nofollow ugc">documentation</a></p>
</p>
<h4>Does the mixed content fixer make my site slower?</h4>
<p>
<p>On a site where the source consists of about 60.000 characters, the delay caused by the mixed content fixer is about 0.00188 seconds. If this is too much for you, fix the mixed content manually and deactivate it in the settings.</p>
</p>
<h4>Uninstalling Really Simple SSL</h4>
<p>
<p>The plugin checks your certificate before enabling, but if, for example, you migrated the site to a non-ssl environment, you might get locked out of the back-end.<br />
If you can&#8217;t deactivate, do not just remove the plugin folder to uninstall! Follow these <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/uninstall-websitebackend-not-accessible/" rel="nofollow ugc">instructions</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Mixed content issues</h4>
<p>
<p>Most mixed content issues are caused by URL&#8217;s in css or js files.<br />
For detailed instructions on how to find mixed content read this <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/how-to-track-down-mixed-content-or-insecure-content/" rel="nofollow ugc">article</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Redirect loop issues</h4>
<p>
<p>If you are experiencing redirect loops on your site, try these <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/my-website-is-in-a-redirect-loop/" rel="nofollow ugc">instructions</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Is the plugin multisite compatible?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. There is a dedicated network settings page where you can switch between network activated SSL and per page SSL. In the dedicated pro for multisite plugin, you can override all site settings for SSL on the network level, and can activate and deactivate SSL in the network menu for each site.</p>
</p>

";s:11:"screenshots";s:823:"<ol><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/really-simple-ssl/assets/screenshot-1.jpg?rev=1426260"><img src="https://ps.w.org/really-simple-ssl/assets/screenshot-1.jpg?rev=1426260" alt="After activation, if SSL was detected, you can enable SSL."></a><p>After activation, if SSL was detected, you can enable SSL.</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/really-simple-ssl/assets/screenshot-2.jpg?rev=2263742"><img src="https://ps.w.org/really-simple-ssl/assets/screenshot-2.jpg?rev=2263742" alt="View your configuration on the settings page."></a><p>View your configuration on the settings page.</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/really-simple-ssl/assets/screenshot-3.png?rev=1881345"><img src="https://ps.w.org/really-simple-ssl/assets/screenshot-3.png?rev=1881345" alt="Mixed content scan."></a><p>Mixed content scan.</p></li></ol>";}s:11:"description";s:3355:"<p>Really Simple SSL automatically detects your settings and configures your website to run over https.<br />
To keep it lightweight, the options are kept to a minimum. The entire site will move to SSL.</p>
<h4>Three simple steps for setup:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Get an SSL certificate (can&#8217;t do that for you, sorry.) <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/how-to-install-a-free-ssl-certificate-on-your-wordpress-cpanel-hosting/" rel="nofollow ugc">See our recommendations for a free SSL certificate</a>.</li>
<li>Activate this plugin</li>
<li>Enable SSL with one click</li>
</ul>
<p>Always backup before you go! If you do not have a sound backup policy, start having one! See <a href="https://really-simple-ssl.com/knowledge-base/backing-up-your-site/" rel="nofollow ugc">our recommendations</a>.</p>
<p>Any code suggestions? We&#8217;re on <a href="https://github.com/rlankhorst/really-simple-ssl" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub</a> as well!</p>
<h4>Love Really Simple SSL?</h4>
<p>Hopefully this plugin saves you some hours of work. If you want to support the continuing development of this plugin, you might consider buying the <a href="https://www.really-simple-ssl.com/pro/" rel="nofollow ugc">premium</a>, which includes<br />
some cool features.</p>
<h4>Pro features</h4>
<ul>
<li>The mixed content scan, which shows you what you have to do if you don&#8217;t have the secure lock yet</li>
<li>The option to enable HTTP Strict Transport Security</li>
<li>The option to configure your site for the HSTS preload list</li>
<li>Advanced security headers for additional security</li>
<li>Mixed Content Fixer for the back-end</li>
<li>More detailed feedback on the configuration page</li>
<li>Certificate expiration check: get an email when your SSL certificate is about to expire</li>
<li>Premium support</li>
</ul>
<h4>What does the plugin actually do</h4>
<ul>
<li>The plugin handles most issues that WordPress has with SSL, like when you&#8217;re behind a reverse proxy/loadbalancer, or when no headers are passed which WordPress can use to detect SSL.</li>
<li>All incoming requests are redirected to https. Default with an internal WordPress redirect, but you can also enable a .htaccess redirect.</li>
<li>The siteurl and homeurl are changed to https.</li>
<li>Your insecure content is fixed by replacing all http:// URL&#8217;s with https://, except hyperlinks to other domains. Dynamically, so no database changes are made (except for the siteurl and homeurl).</li>
</ul>
<p>Check out other plugins developed by Really Simple Plugins as well: <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/complianz-gdpr/">Complianz</a>, <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/zip-recipes/">Zip Recipes</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-search-insights/">WP Search Insights</a>.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.really-simple-ssl.com/contact/" rel="nofollow ugc">contact</a> me if you have any questions, issues, or suggestions. Really Simple SSL is developed by <a href="https://www.really-simple-plugins.com" rel="nofollow ugc">Really Simple Plugins</a>.</p>
<h4>Like to have this plugin in your language?</h4>
<p>Translations can be added very easily <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/really-simple-ssl" rel="nofollow ugc">here</a>. If you do, I can get you added as translation editor to approve the translations.</p>
